name: Invert (C3DR1C4k)
description:
Puzzle Jump and Run

Controls:

Left click to Invert Cubes

Right click to Show Range of Invert

E to Pickup / Place cubes 

ESC to Pause

Colors and the function of the Cubes:

- Green Cube: Solid

- Purple Cube: not Solid and Moveable

- Red Cube: Solid

- Turquoise Cube: not Solid

- Blue Cube: Speed Boost and Solid

- Yellow Cube: Jump Boost and Solid
